name: Stairway to the Afterlife
description:
The Game

You died, but your adventure is not yet finished. The Heavens are at your arms reach but the path ahead is full of perils... and if you would fall... the Hell would claim your soul!

The Developer

Hi I am Plonix, or also Irekean based on the nickname. This is my first completed game for the GameDev.Tv 2022 GameJam completed in less than 7 days. Thank you for playing it, I know that it's not much but you gotta start from somewhere!

The code is opensource and you can find it on GitHub but you won't find any assets since I don't own them and I can't upload them. Still, all the assets are free and you can find their link both on Github and also in this page:

Assets Used:

Clouds from Quaternius @ opengameart

https://opengameart.org/content/4-trees-3-clouds-and-2-bushes

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-male-character-k...

https://opengameart.org/content/heavenly-loop
